title: I'm SICK of trolls.
body:
This is absolutely stupid. I swear this happens every 3rd lobby.
I call my role and some stupid inconsiderate person instalocks my role without even calling it. So I don't get to play the role that I call and am placed in some role that I suck at. This is absolutely silly because I have to dodge and I have to wait like 5 or 15 minutes when the troll can just continue trolling.
I don't even know how to solve this problem. Maybe by having like a kicking system in Champion select, but then you might be kicked for playing an out-of-meta champ, and people can still intentionally feed in game.

replies.body: You don't know how to solve the problem?? How about instead of quitting, LEARN THE FKING ROLE. The first step to solving a problem is realizing that there is one. Realize that you can't change other people, only yourself. Learn
That's not the point. The point is I called the role and the person has no right to instalock. Don't use unnecessary profanity. This is the whole reason I have been trying to learn mid.

> [{quoted}](name=Truegolddigger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JVAhmvBA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-23T12:17:52.813+0000)
>
> That's not the point. The point is I called the role and the person has no right to instalock. Don't use unnecessary profanity. This is the whole reason I have been trying to learn mid.

 he's not breaking any rules by instalocking though. it might be annoying, but tough shit, there's nothing you can do about it.
The person is breaking the rules of being a nice person.  ;(

if its draft/ranked then pick order>call order

if this is in non draft then not instalocking is a courtesy not trolling/etc.
if you want to play a specific role, go play team builder, thats what it is there for
calling does nothing except let your team know what you want/good at for them to make an informed decision

instalocking is rude but thats about it

> [{quoted}](name=l2noob4ul,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JVAhmvBA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-23T22:50:23.577+0000)
>
> if its draft/ranked then pick order>call order
> 
> if this is in non draft then not instalocking is a courtesy not trolling/etc.
> if you want to play a specific role, go play team builder, thats what it is there for
> calling does nothing except let your team know what you want/good at for them to make an informed decision
> 
> instalocking is rude but thats about it

I agree with this.  I obviously sympathise, but in normals,  it's just considered courtesy.   Most you can do is agree as a team to report for lack of communication or something.
You tell me to play team builder. I wait like 10 minutes in a lobby to find a match and never find one. That isn't an option.

Okay so 99.5% of all Summoners don't like trolls and were all sick of them without adding any curse words. But honestly there is nothing you can do unless you ban them forever... but then they make more accounts and they get banned so they make more accounts and so on and so on.
